channel.title: Run.bat error :o
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 8242.8224 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.checkAndLoadMain(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
That's what I get when I run it. This is my run.bat [code]@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m client pause[/code]

item.title: Run.bat error :o
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“clawzkillall, post:1, topic:429606”]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 8242.8224 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.checkAndLoadMain(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

That’s what I get when I run it. This is my run.bat @echo off title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m client pause[/quote]

I’m not entirely sure what happened there, but the class you’re trying to run, isn’t really a class.

Acceptable major.minor numbers would be 49.0, 51.0, etc. not 8242.8224

However 8242 and 8224 both can be converted to the hexadecimal values 0x2032 and 0x2020, which translate into the ASCII string " 2 ".

Clean your build folder, and recompile.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error :o
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

major minor error is thrown when your java used to run a batch file is older than the java used to compile. This can be resolved by downloading the newest java and recompiling then playing with the edited settings.

Read full topic
